Uses of Class
fer.util.UnitData

  • Packages that use UnitData 
    Package Description
    fer  
    fer.util  

    • Uses of UnitData in fer

      Methods in fer with parameters of type UnitData 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Map.init(GoalData[] goalData, UnitData[] unitData)
      To be run after a map is selected in the menu, this method pulls all of the relevant data from the map's corresponding GoalData and UnitData messenger classes in order to initialize the map's faction map goals and units.
      Constructors in fer with parameters of type UnitData 
      Constructor and Description
      Unit(UnitData data) 

    • Uses of UnitData in fer.util

      Methods in fer.util that return types with arguments of type UnitData 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<UnitData> XMLReader.serializeAllUnitData(int gameType, int index)
      Returns the UnitData messenger classes for all of the units for the specified map index of the specified game mode.
